sentence.Network_cn: 他的学问显然博大精深。

sentence.Network_en: They fancied themselves learned and assumed airs of erudition.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们自以为有学问,摆出一副博学的样子.

sentence.Network_en: The profound erudition of the writer came from long years of study.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位作家渊博的学问来自长年累月的钻研.
